channel.title: Complier
channel.description:
Wat do i do my comlier file says this #!/bin/bash
# Tested with: SuSE Linux 10.0 # Requires java path be stored in $PATH
# Usage: # Enter the following in terminal before first usage: # "chmod +x compile.sh && chmod +x run.sh
javac -classpath . -d bin *.java -g
wats a terminal??? And how come i cant get it to complie?

item.title: Complier
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

Setting your paths, mine is perfectly working, you probaly don’t have the right jdk version, or havn’t set the correct paths.

Read full topic

item.title: Complier
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

[quote=“burst str, post:1, topic:254462”]Wat do i do my comlier file says this
#!/bin/bash

Tested with: SuSE Linux 10.0

Requires java path be stored in $PATH

Usage:

Enter the following in terminal before first usage:

"chmod +x compile.sh && chmod +x run.sh

javac -classpath . -d bin *.java -g

wats a terminal???
And how come i cant get it to complie?[/quote]
That’s for Linux.

Read full topic

item.title: Complier
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

Try using this one:

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

If that doesn’t work tell me the error, and i’ll give you another one.

Read full topic
